00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOV
00042 
00043 #include <linux/math64.h>
00044 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>

00051 static int lsm_lmm_verify_common(struct lov_mds_md *lmm, int lmm_bytes,
00052                                  __u16 stripe_count)
00053 {
00054         if (stripe_count > LOV_V1_INSANE_STRIPE_COUNT) {
00055                 CERROR("bad stripe count %d\n", stripe_count);
00056                 lov_dump_lmm_common(D_WARNING, lmm);
00057                 return -EINVAL;
00058         }
00059 
00060         if (lmm_oi_id(&lmm->lmm_oi) == 0) {
00061                 CERROR("zero object id\n");
00062                 lov_dump_lmm_common(D_WARNING, lmm);
00063                 return -EINVAL;
00064         }
00065 
00066         if (lov_pattern(le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern)) != LOV_PATTERN_RAID0) {
00067                 CERROR("bad striping pattern\n");
00068                 lov_dump_lmm_common(D_WARNING, lmm);
00069                 return -EINVAL;
00070         }
00071 
00072         if (lmm->lmm_stripe_size == 0 ||
00073             (le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_size)&(LOV_MIN_STRIPE_SIZE-1)) != 0) {
00074                 CERROR("bad stripe size %u\n",
00075                        le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_size));
00076                 lov_dump_lmm_common(D_WARNING, lmm);
00077                 return -EINVAL;
00078         }
00079         return 0;
00080 }
00081 
00082 struct lov_stripe_md *lsm_alloc_plain(u16 stripe_count)
00083 {
00084         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm;
00085         struct lov_oinfo     *loi;
00086         size_t lsm_size;
00087         size_t oinfo_ptrs_size;
00088         int i;
00089 
00090         LASSERT(stripe_count <= LOV_MAX_STRIPE_COUNT);
00091 
00092         oinfo_ptrs_size = sizeof(struct lov_oinfo *) * stripe_count;
00093         lsm_size = sizeof(*lsm) + oinfo_ptrs_size;
00094 
00095         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(lsm, lsm_size);
00096         if (!lsm)
00097                 return NULL;
00098 
00099         for (i = 0; i < stripe_count; i++) {
00100                 OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(loi, lov_oinfo_slab, GFP_NOFS);
00101                 if (loi == NULL)
00102                         goto err;
00103                 lsm->lsm_oinfo[i] = loi;
00104         }
00105         lsm->lsm_stripe_count = stripe_count;
00106         return lsm;
00107 
00108 err:
00109         while (--i >= 0)
00110                 OBD_SLAB_FREE(lsm->lsm_oinfo[i], lov_oinfo_slab, sizeof(*loi));
00111 
00112         OBD_FREE_LARGE(lsm, lsm_size);
00113 
00114         return NULL;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void lsm_free_plain(struct lov_stripe_md *lsm)
00118 {
00119         __u16 stripe_count = lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00120         int i;
00121 
00122         for (i = 0; i < stripe_count; i++)
00123                 OBD_SLAB_FREE(lsm->lsm_oinfo[i], lov_oinfo_slab,
00124                               sizeof(struct lov_oinfo));
00125         OBD_FREE_LARGE(lsm, sizeof(struct lov_stripe_md) +
00126                        stripe_count * sizeof(struct lov_oinfo *));
00127 }
00128 
00129 /* Find minimum stripe maxbytes value.  For inactive or
00130  * reconnecting targets use LUSTRE_EXT3_STRIPE_MAXBYTES. */
00131 static loff_t lov_tgt_maxbytes(struct lov_tgt_desc *tgt)
00132 {
00133         struct obd_import *imp;
00134         loff_t maxbytes = LUSTRE_EXT3_STRIPE_MAXBYTES;
00135 
00136         if (!tgt->ltd_active)
00137                 return maxbytes;
00138 
00139         imp = tgt->ltd_obd->u.cli.cl_import;
00140         if (imp == NULL)
00141                 return maxbytes;
00142 
00143         spin_lock(&imp->imp_lock);
00144         if (imp->imp_state == LUSTRE_IMP_FULL &&
00145             (imp->imp_connect_data.ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_MAXBYTES) &&
00146             imp->imp_connect_data.ocd_maxbytes > 0)
00147                 maxbytes = imp->imp_connect_data.ocd_maxbytes;
00148 
00149         spin_unlock(&imp->imp_lock);
00150 
00151         return maxbytes;
00152 }
00153 
00154 static int lsm_unpackmd_common(struct lov_obd *lov,
00155                                struct lov_stripe_md *lsm,
00156                                struct lov_mds_md *lmm,
00157                                struct lov_ost_data_v1 *objects)
00158 {
00159         struct lov_oinfo *loi;
00160         loff_t stripe_maxbytes = LLONG_MAX;
00161         unsigned int stripe_count;
00162         unsigned int i;
00163 
00164         /*
00165          * This supposes lov_mds_md_v1/v3 first fields are
00166          * are the same
00167          */
00168         lmm_oi_le_to_cpu(&lsm->lsm_oi, &lmm->lmm_oi);
00169         lsm->lsm_stripe_size = le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_size);
00170         lsm->lsm_pattern = le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern);
00171         lsm->lsm_layout_gen = le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_layout_gen);
00172         lsm->lsm_pool_name[0] = '\0';
00173 
00174         stripe_count = lsm_is_released(lsm) ? 0 : lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00175 
00176         for (i = 0; i < stripe_count; i++) {
00177                 loi = lsm->lsm_oinfo[i];
00178                 ostid_le_to_cpu(&objects[i].l_ost_oi, &loi->loi_oi);
00179                 loi->loi_ost_idx = le32_to_cpu(objects[i].l_ost_idx);
00180                 loi->loi_ost_gen = le32_to_cpu(objects[i].l_ost_gen);
00181                 if (lov_oinfo_is_dummy(loi))
00182                         continue;
00183 
00184                 if (loi->loi_ost_idx >= lov->desc.ld_tgt_count &&
00185                     !lov2obd(lov)->obd_process_conf) {
00186                         CERROR("%s: OST index %d more than OST count %d\n",
00187                                (char*)lov->desc.ld_uuid.uuid,
00188                                loi->loi_ost_idx, lov->desc.ld_tgt_count);
00189                         lov_dump_lmm_v1(D_WARNING, lmm);
00190                         return -EINVAL;
00191                 }
00192 
00193                 if (lov->lov_tgts[loi->loi_ost_idx] == NULL) {
00194                         CERROR("%s: OST index %d missing\n",
00195                                (char*)lov->desc.ld_uuid.uuid, loi->loi_ost_idx);
00196                         lov_dump_lmm_v1(D_WARNING, lmm);
00197                         continue;
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 stripe_maxbytes = min_t(loff_t, stripe_maxbytes,
00201                                         lov_tgt_maxbytes(
00202                                         lov->lov_tgts[loi->loi_ost_idx]));
00203         }
00204 
00205         if (stripe_maxbytes == LLONG_MAX)
00206                 stripe_maxbytes = LUSTRE_EXT3_STRIPE_MAXBYTES;
00207 
00208         if (lsm->lsm_stripe_count == 0)
00209                 lsm->lsm_maxbytes = stripe_maxbytes * lov->desc.ld_tgt_count;
00210         else
00211                 lsm->lsm_maxbytes = stripe_maxbytes * lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00212 
00213         return 0;
00214 }
00215 
00216 static void
00217 lsm_stripe_by_index_plain(struct lov_stripe_md *lsm, int *stripeno,
00218                           loff_t *lov_off, loff_t *swidth)
00219 {
00220         if (swidth != NULL)
00221                 *swidth = (loff_t)lsm->lsm_stripe_size * lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00222 }
00223 
00224 static void
00225 lsm_stripe_by_offset_plain(struct lov_stripe_md *lsm, int *stripeno,
00226                            loff_t *lov_off, loff_t *swidth)
00227 {
00228         if (swidth != NULL)
00229                 *swidth = (loff_t)lsm->lsm_stripe_size * lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00230 }
00231 
00232 static int lsm_lmm_verify_v1(struct lov_mds_md_v1 *lmm, int lmm_bytes,
00233                              __u16 *stripe_count)
00234 {
00235         if (lmm_bytes < sizeof(*lmm)) {
00236                 CERROR("lov_mds_md_v1 too small: %d, need at least %d\n",
00237                        lmm_bytes, (int)sizeof(*lmm));
00238                 return -EINVAL;
00239         }
00240 
00241         *stripe_count = le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_count);
00242         if (le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern) & LOV_PATTERN_F_RELEASED)
00243                 *stripe_count = 0;
00244 
00245         if (lmm_bytes < lov_mds_md_size(*stripe_count, LOV_MAGIC_V1)) {
00246                 CERROR("LOV EA V1 too small: %d, need %d\n",
00247                        lmm_bytes, lov_mds_md_size(*stripe_count, LOV_MAGIC_V1));
00248                 lov_dump_lmm_common(D_WARNING, lmm);
00249                 return -EINVAL;
00250         }
00251 
00252         return lsm_lmm_verify_common(lmm, lmm_bytes, *stripe_count);
00253 }
00254 
00255 static int lsm_unpackmd_v1(struct lov_obd *lov, struct lov_stripe_md *lsm,
00256                            struct lov_mds_md_v1 *lmm)
00257 {
00258         return lsm_unpackmd_common(lov, lsm, lmm, lmm->lmm_objects);
00259 }
00260 
00261 const struct lsm_operations lsm_v1_ops = {
00262         .lsm_free            = lsm_free_plain,
00263         .lsm_stripe_by_index    = lsm_stripe_by_index_plain,
00264         .lsm_stripe_by_offset   = lsm_stripe_by_offset_plain,
00265         .lsm_lmm_verify         = lsm_lmm_verify_v1,
00266         .lsm_unpackmd           = lsm_unpackmd_v1,
00267 };
00268 
00269 static int lsm_lmm_verify_v3(struct lov_mds_md *lmmv1, int lmm_bytes,
00270                              __u16 *stripe_count)
00271 {
00272         struct lov_mds_md_v3 *lmm;
00273 
00274         lmm = (struct lov_mds_md_v3 *)lmmv1;
00275 
00276         if (lmm_bytes < sizeof(*lmm)) {
00277                 CERROR("lov_mds_md_v3 too small: %d, need at least %d\n",
00278                        lmm_bytes, (int)sizeof(*lmm));
00279                 return -EINVAL;
00280         }
00281 
00282         *stripe_count = le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_count);
00283         if (le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern) & LOV_PATTERN_F_RELEASED)
00284                 *stripe_count = 0;
00285 
00286         if (lmm_bytes < lov_mds_md_size(*stripe_count, LOV_MAGIC_V3)) {
00287                 CERROR("LOV EA V3 too small: %d, need %d\n",
00288                        lmm_bytes, lov_mds_md_size(*stripe_count, LOV_MAGIC_V3));
00289                 lov_dump_lmm_common(D_WARNING, lmm);
00290                 return -EINVAL;
00291         }
00292 
00293         return lsm_lmm_verify_common((struct lov_mds_md_v1 *)lmm, lmm_bytes,
00294                                      *stripe_count);
00295 }
00296 
00297 static int lsm_unpackmd_v3(struct lov_obd *lov, struct lov_stripe_md *lsm,
00298                            struct lov_mds_md *lmm)
00299 {
00300         struct lov_mds_md_v3 *lmm_v3 = (struct lov_mds_md_v3 *)lmm;
00301         size_t cplen;
00302         int rc;
00303 
00304         rc = lsm_unpackmd_common(lov, lsm, lmm, lmm_v3->lmm_objects);
00305         if (rc != 0)
00306                 return rc;
00307 
00308         cplen = strlcpy(lsm->lsm_pool_name, lmm_v3->lmm_pool_name,
00309                         sizeof(lsm->lsm_pool_name));
00310         if (cplen >= sizeof(lsm->lsm_pool_name))
00311                 return -E2BIG;
00312 
00313         return 0;
00314 }
00315 
00316 const struct lsm_operations lsm_v3_ops = {
00317         .lsm_free            = lsm_free_plain,
00318         .lsm_stripe_by_index    = lsm_stripe_by_index_plain,
00319         .lsm_stripe_by_offset   = lsm_stripe_by_offset_plain,
00320         .lsm_lmm_verify         = lsm_lmm_verify_v3,
00321         .lsm_unpackmd           = lsm_unpackmd_v3,
00322 };
00323 
00324 void dump_lsm(unsigned int level, const struct lov_stripe_md *lsm)
00325 {
00326         CDEBUG(level, "lsm %p, objid "DOSTID", maxbytes "LPX64", magic 0x%08X,"
00327                " stripe_size %u, stripe_count %u, refc: %d,"
00328                " layout_gen %u, pool ["LOV_POOLNAMEF"]\n", lsm,
00329                POSTID(&lsm->lsm_oi), lsm->lsm_maxbytes, lsm->lsm_magic,
00330                lsm->lsm_stripe_size, lsm->lsm_stripe_count,
00331                atomic_read(&lsm->lsm_refc), lsm->lsm_layout_gen,
00332                lsm->lsm_pool_name);
00333 }
